rna.description: Optional section that should be included ONLY when RNAseq data is available.  bam_file is the sorted.bam file; expression_file is the salmon expression (.sf) file

disk_size.description: Disk size to use, in GB, default 750

somatic_caller.description: Somatic variant caller to use, choose from {tnsnv, tnhaplotyper2, tnscope (default)}

cimac_center.description: CIMAC center the samples associate with, i.e. broad, mocha, or mda

wes_commit.description: Specific wes commit string to use (filled by pipeline team)

image.description: Specific wes google image to use (filled by pipeline team)

wes_ref_snapshot.description: Specific wes reference snapshot to use (filled by pipeline team)

trim_soft_clip.description: Specifies whether the variant caller should soft-clip the reads (default: False)
